description: Semantic model for the DB information present in a span during intake.

db.system.description: An identifier for the database management system (DBMS) product being used.
db.system.title: DB System

db.connection_string.description: The connection string used to connect to the database.
db.connection_string.title: DB Connection String

db.name.description: The name of the database being connected to.
db.name.title: DB Name

db.operation.description: The name of the operation being executed, e.g. the MongoDB command name such as findAndModify, or the SQL keyword.
db.operation.title: DB Operation

db.sql.table.description: The name of the primary table that the operation is acting upon, including the database name (if applicable).
db.sql.table.title: DB SQL Table

db.row_count.description:
The number of rows/results from the query or operation. For caches and other datastores, i.e. Redis, this tag should only set for operations that retrieve stored data,
such as GET operations and queries, excluding SET and other commands not returning data.
db.row_count.title: DB Row Count

title: IntakeResolvedDbSpan
